scripts.deploy: eval $(grep '^PROFILE' .env) && eval $(grep '^AWS_BUCKET_NAME' .env) && aws --profile $PROFILE s3 sync --delete ./build s3://$AWS_BUCKET_NAME
scripts.create-bucket: eval $(grep '^PROFILE' .env) && eval $(grep '^AWS_BUCKET_NAME' .env) && eval $(grep '^AWS_REGION' .env) && aws --profile $PROFILE s3api create-bucket --bucket $AWS_BUCKET_NAME --region $AWS_REGION --create-bucket-configuration LocationConstraint=$AWS_REGION
scripts.configure-bucket: eval $(grep '^PROFILE' .env) && eval $(grep '^AWS_BUCKET_NAME' .env) && aws --profile $PROFILE s3api put-bucket-policy --bucket $AWS_BUCKET_NAME --policy file:///$PWD/settings/bucket_policy.json && aws --profile $PROFILE s3 website s3://$AWS_BUCKET_NAME --index-document index.html --error-document index.html
scripts.BUILD-AND-DEPLOY: npm run build && npm run deploy
scripts.BUILD-AND-DEPLOY-PROD: npm run build-prod && npm run deploy
